wikipedia_page.main: Julian Malviya McWatt  (born (1978-12-27)27 December 1978 in Croydon) is a British born Guyanese male weightlifter, competing in the 85 kg category and representing Guyana at international competitions. He participated at the 2004 Summer Olympics in the 85 kg event. He competed at world championships, most recently at the 2003 World Weightlifting Championships.
